question:
USA recently replaced Kuwait as the 6th largest oil supplier to India. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. USA is a member of OPEC.
  2. USA is a member of the OPEC+ group.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: USA is not a member of the Organisation of Petroleum Exporting Countries. OPEC is an international organisation formed in 1960 and is composed of 14 member states. Some of the OPEC countries are Kuwait, Iran, Iraq, Saudi Arabia, etc. Iraq is Indiaâ€™s largest supplier currently. Statement 2 is incorrect: USA is not a member of OPEC+ group which is also called the Vienna Group. OPEC+ is a grouping of non- OPEC oil producing countries. Russia, Malaysia, South Sudan, Mexico, Kazakhstan, Oman, etc. are some of its members. USA is currently the 6th largest oil supplier to India.
